column1: As Congressman Denver Riggleman kicked off his re-election campaign Saturday afternoon hundreds of supporters cheered him on at the Boar’s Head Inn in Charlottesville. #VA05 Read more here:  https://t.co/LZMBqNjA3z

Thank you to everyone who came out to the campaign launch yesterday- it was great to see friends from all over #VA05 and see the enthusiasm for #DenverDoesJobs and my re-election campaign! https://t.co/2d7Hz4TrpR

Great crowd at the Boar's Head today for my campaign launch-- it's not too late to join @Cline4Virginia @DrewFergusonGA and my team for the event. Details here #VA05: https://t.co/S9z5nzA7yU https://t.co/Bs0q1ir2Jm

Democrats in Virginia advanced bills to enfringe on #2A rights Monday.  I've seen tremendous enthusiasm for the Second Amendment and heard from many #VA05 constituents who support it.  I will always support their rights.

This infringement on a Constitutional right goes beyond the pale- gun ranges are some of the safest places to operate a firearm.  I ran for office to stop the government from weaponizing bad decisions and encroaching on American rights.  https://t.co/5nzQ7DJHMq

Yesterday I filed paperwork on behalf of @realDonaldTrump's re-election campaign getting him on the ballot in Virginia. "I'm happy to do it. I support the president so they had me go there and file for him today." @TeamTrump https://t.co/EltgzLgikX

This afternoon @VA_GOP Chair Jack Wilson and I filed the paperwork for @realDonaldTrump to appear on the ballot in Virginia in 2020! Proud to be a Virginia State Chair for @TeamTrump! https://t.co/3d2oN8YtXs
Thanks to everyone who came out in Warrenton to join my campaign in #VA05!  I'll always stand up for our shared values! https://t.co/ilSx8JD6Fi

I know first-hand the devastating effect of Iran’s activities against American service members in the Middle East...President Trump’s escalated airstrikes against those planning to inflict harm on Americans are warranted responses against Iranian actions.  https://t.co/iTYgmSGZKd

Our LAST and BIGGEST campaign deadline of the year is just hours away and we are SO close to hitting our 2019 goals. Click below to donate to my re-election campaign and send a message to national democrats that #VA05 will stay RED! Thank you! https://t.co/xxwsWsM5Gl https://t.co/TLUAnW1Gy0

My deepest condolences to the victims of this tragedy and my deepest respect for the security team who acted heroically. "This team responded quickly and within six seconds the shooting was over." Their brave actions and their #2A rights saved lives.  https://t.co/V2kDc52a8V

Thank you to everyone who came out for my campaign Christmas party in Charlottesville last night- and apologies to those who came but couldn't fit in the room.  All of your support means so much to me and is why I will keep fighting for you! #VA05 https://t.co/gAox3pjHcc

Denver Riggleman said: “The nature of the entire process of this proceeding reeks of careerist bureaucrats and politicians that put politics over people. I was not elected to take political votes that attempt to overturn the will of the American people.”  https://t.co/SiaUBWlZdw
Thank you @realDonaldTrump  for your endorsement.  I've got your six. #MAGA https://t.co/1Kvhu1YeQT
@realDonaldTrump Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your endorsement.  I've got your six. #MAGA
Thank you Warrenton for a great campaign rally this evening!  I will always fight for #VA05 and our shared conservative values! https://t.co/8R1sZBfnZn
Last week I was interviewed at the @VA_GOP Advance.  Listen here:  https://t.co/mGIjhTtAd7

The gun sanctuary movement is spreading like wildfire. Virginia Congressman Denver Riggleman is backing the effort. “I stand with all those who are exercising their First Amendment right to free speech on this important issue.”  https://t.co/3hRy6D1zPu

I urge the Board of Supervisors to support this resolution- the 2nd Amendment is a Constitutional Right for all Americans that should not be infringed. I stand with all those who are exercising their First Amendment right to free speech on this issue.  https://t.co/cvcH6GKO6r

Congressman Riggleman denounced House Speaker Nancy Pelosi’s order that the House Judiciary Committee draft articles of impeachment. On Thursday the Nelson County Republican accused the top Democrat in Congress of ignoring the requirements she established https://t.co/sXwUlh0SnQ

“This is one state where it all began" Riggleman said.  “This has nothing to do with urban and rural but with people wanting to defend their constitutional rights as citizens." #VA05  https://t.co/8x1iCnYwzD
Last night I visited with the @Longwood_CRs in Farmville.  We spoke about my time in Congress border security and threats from China.  Thank you for having me! https://t.co/w46jmgE1mE

“I want to do things right but I understand the angst. I think the anger and fear you see right now is really indicative of what’s happening in the polarizing of politics in Virginia and nationwide” said U.S. Rep. Denver Riggleman.  https://t.co/rfJbegy4BH
Yesterday I attended the @libertyflames football game in Lynchburg.  What a great time and thank you @JerryFalwellJr for the invitation! https://t.co/11DH7Cvnn0

https://t.co/l56rmNfuW5 This bill recognizes the families of veterans who have lost a loved one to the tragedy of veteran suicide. This designation will reconnect these veterans' families to the military community and uplift the bravery of their veteran who is deserving of honor.

“I am proud to offer my endorsement of Congressman Denver Riggleman for re-election in the 5th District of Virginia. Denver has been a champion for our conservative values in Congress and I respect his commitment to liberty-minded ideals." #VA05  https://t.co/Ca1BHAbxTM https://t.co/nBEoCCuJEW
Denver Riggleman delivered a speech on the floor of the House of Representatives defending capitalism and standing up for small business owners.  Read more here:  https://t.co/o6IduAwZc8

Denver has fought together with the Freedom Caucus on the issues that matter most and has always stood up for Americans’ Constitutional rights” #VA05  https://t.co/6BSQF0vPK1,2019-11-18 14:25:49,TweetDeck,6,19
That's the frustrating part of all this..is this just a continuation of Mueller.  I think this process started on the night of the election" said Rep. Denver Riggleman R-Va. “I think it started then it hasn’t ended and I think that’s a shame.” https://t.co/5BCJxS0ALF
House Freedom Caucus Chairman Congressman Andy Biggs Endorses Congressman Denver Riggleman in #VA05  https://t.co/JQS3zm23co https://t.co/7jZdGdWNOM
Today is #ElectionDay Virginia! Make sure to vote- you can find your polling place here: https://t.co/jlLHuvnrfo
Last night I was with the @AlbemarleGOP rallying our volunteers before #ElectionDay.  Remember to get out and vote tomorrow #VA05!  https://t.co/60kFscGHgb
“Hopefully the Democratic leadership will get the USMCA out. We’ve gotta have it and for Virginia it’s huge for us.”  https://t.co/tvtKjdsJ4j

Last night I was in Madison for their Halloween "Trunk or Treat" event!  I had a great time giving out candy and celebrating Halloween 1 extra night! Also ran into @NickForVA who has a big election next week!  #Va05 has great Republican candidates so get out and vote on Tuesday!

Rep. Denver Riggleman R-Nelson took issue with voting on a measure for a proceeding that has been handled behind closed doors so far.  “There’s no way I’m going to vote to affirm an inquiry that’s really partisan” Riggleman said.  https://t.co/woy1gxsYja

Christine and I voted in-person absentee this morning for next week's elections.   Please make a plan to vote on next Tuesday Nov. 5 and make your voice heard. #electionday2019 https://t.co/XZBbjFcnOj

Thinking with an economic consecutive miracle strategy—and that strategy is how do we fix the issues with economic growth whether it’s infrastructure rural broadband wireless solutions cell tower placement satellite solutions.   #VA05 Read more here: https://t.co/Y4Dg7ZVV8z

“I actually have sensed that impeachment isn’t as big of a topic in the 5th District as people think it is watching the national news...They’re not going to get anything done for the American people. And that’s ridiculous.”  Read more here: https://t.co/5l0ix47N0g

Yesterday I was with State Senator Mark Peake and @WendellWalkerVA.  They are on the ballot on Nov. 5 and it is important for conservatives in their districts and around Virginia to vote in this year's elections! https://t.co/qjSuORLLyX
Yesterday I joined the @jeffkatzshow on WRVA and called on Democrats to act with transparency. https://t.co/6NJKy7P4Io

Riggleman called the announcement a “head scratcher.” He said Democrats have wanted to impeach Trump since his 2016 election. “As a new congressman it just feels like we can’t get anything done for our districts as they continue down this rabbit hole" https://t.co/3fWRvI2J03

Last night I had the incredible honor of celebrating @UVA President Jim Ryan’s Birthday with him at the @UVAFootball game in Charlottesville. I also ran into @UVAMensLax coach Lars Tiffany with the National Championship trophy. #Wahoowa to both! #VA05 https://t.co/xC5MEBjNL3
I spent this morning with the Southside Virginia Firefighters! Great parade through Farmville. Support our firefighters and those that serve in #VA05 https://t.co/7oH5I3vtpj

Last week I attended an event in Farmville with members of our 5th district Republican committee and local volunteers. I spoke about the importance of this November’s elections and encouraged them to work hard for all our candidates. https://t.co/cYQ4GU5BG8
Congratulations to Dan Bishop (@jdanbishop) and Greg Murphy (@DrGregMurphy1) for winning election to the House of Representatives today! Great to see two new Republicans in the House
Thank you Governor @georgeallenva for the support! #VA05 https://t.co/p6r1QhOMZt
Thank you @JerryFalwellJr for your support- onward to victory in 2020! #VA05 https://t.co/ujUdUWAKPB

Last week I had the privilege of attending the Montgomery County GOP’s 20th Obenshain- Dalton Dinner. Thank you to @nickrushva @JoeforVA @DRSuetterlein @ForrestHite and Sherri Blevins for being such welcoming hosts. https://t.co/VJMzS7MVyS
Last week I went on a Southside Tour- including a visit to Cardinal Homes in Charlotte County  https://t.co/lQPU2vxXiv #VA05

Last week I attended the @AlbemarleGOP Boots Bales & Tractors Party!  With #LaborDay and this November’s elections fast approaching we need to work hard to support Republican candidates in Virginia and #VA05 https://t.co/I0KUOeD7Yn

First it's getting the USMCA passed but also its H-2A workers...but it's also the regulatory hurdles that many people face in any type of farming. You know anything from hemp to tobacco...how the USDA is cutting back on those regulations.  https://t.co/k2DnBsXcsO

Control of the Virginia General Assembly will be decided in this November’s elections and we must work hard to keep our majority. That’s why I’m happy to have attended events with some of our great delegates and senators including @DelRBell @MichaelWebert @NickForVA and @ReevesVA https://t.co/b3r0id1OZ3
Happy to be with you this weekend @JohnWhitbeck! https://t.co/DDzLrVK06P

The best constituents in the world live in Virginia’s 5th district. Great to be back in Virginia this morning.  And congrats to David here who just celebrated his 55th wedding anniversary. #va05 https://t.co/1zRU2gv2YI

Today I was back in Charlottesville and went to lunch at Riverside. Thank you Linda. Lunch brought back so many memories from my childhood in Charlottesville and when my dad would take me to eat the great cheeseburgers at Riverside. https://t.co/bWf5iOJMIP

It was a tremendous honor to clean the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in DC yesterday.  We should never forget the  sacrifice of our veterans and always honor the memories of those who gave the ultimate sacrifice. https://t.co/mdQTyrEeET
Thank you to the @LynHillcats for welcoming me on Friday and letting me throw out the first pitch. I hope I made you and #va05 proud! https://t.co/PS3ICPowsV
More pictures from the Grand opening of the Lynchburg Veterans Home. Great to see so many friends and celebrate a fantastic endeavor. #va05 https://t.co/Az4Ka1rpKi

What a tremendous honor to speak at the Grand opening of the Lynchburg Veterans Home.  "In the military we never saw black white or brown we only saw red white and blue" said Riggleman (R-VA 5th Dist.) who served in the Air Force for 11 years.  #VA05  https://t.co/fdiQmWhRiK https://t.co/j0mfHsov6X

“This $15 minimum wage bill would be a particularly egregious regulation; the non-partisan Congressional Budget Office released a study yesterday that said the wage hike would cost 1.3 million Americans their jobs."  https://t.co/PSEY6tPYoU
Spent some time this afternoon working in the tasting room-  celebrating the #4thofJuly with hundreds of constituents friends and family. #CelebrateFreedom https://t.co/dl9Qy9WMFd

America is shaped by a shared history of generations that have fought to preserve our freedom. Our flag not only represents the past but a future for all citizens of this great country. The American idea is alive for all. Let’s fight together to preserve this great nation. https://t.co/0VdrHa8lOW

I hope I can count on your continued support. We have just hours left in June & your donation today will ensure we can close out the month with the strongest numbers possible. Your donation no matter the size gets us that much closer to success  Donate: https://t.co/raWWLJB3lq https://t.co/YgXSb1Xexz

“This special session is an effort by Gov. Northam and the democrats to infringe on the rights of law-abiding gun owners” Riggleman said “and I hope Republicans in the General Assembly will stand up for our gun rights."  https://t.co/nbaDCgCKOu
Please consider donating to my re-election campaign! The deadline for this quarter is on Sunday! Donate $5 $10 or even $25 here: https://t.co/raWWLJB3lq https://t.co/RrZDYPYbyF

“As an Air Force veteran I don’t want the VA wasting its limited resources on outdated cruel and unnecessary research on dogs.  We can and should do better for veterans and dogs and I’m proud to support the PUPPERS Act to end this abuse.”  https://t.co/vpCZhIGyXF

Happy Father’s Day to all fathers and especially those fathers in uniform serving our country and unable to be with their families. I’ve been there. To everyone else: take complete advantage of the day. I will be watching James Bond movies eating red meat and sipping on bourbon. https://t.co/0b4O5brMNs

This special session is an effort by Gov. Northam and the Democrats to infringe on the rights of law-abiding gun owners Riggleman said "and I hope Republicans in the General Assembly will stand up for our gun rights during this special session."  https://t.co/kU8zevjTYC #VA05
@RepThomasMassie @RepRiggleman We will need to have another tasting to solve this conundrum. However I do vaguely remember you saying something like that. I toast to you Thomas!
@RepThomasMassie just admitted to me that Virginia has better whiskey than Kentucky. https://t.co/si3HFGlMax
Thank you to the @NorfolkGOP for inviting me to speak about my time in Congress to date and what we can do as a party to be successful in 2019 https://t.co/JfCysLwGSm
Congratulations @UVAMensLax on your National Championship! #GoHoos! https://t.co/43O8MQIuBh

Republican Denver Riggleman is leading a piece of legislation that would keep a closer eye on the financial dealings of potential terrorists. This is the first bill championed by Riggleman to pass in the U.S. House of Representatives.  https://t.co/vU1xKOH1yJ
Thank you to the Fauquier NAACP for inviting me to their Annual Banquet. I had a great time and it was fantastic meeting everyone. #VA05 https://t.co/58qwYz4npD

.@PeteButtigieg comments about erasing Thomas Jefferson are a perfect example of clickbait campaigning.  No substance no context just far left buzzwords.  Let's teach history in context not use it for political pandering.  People are sick of this type of divisiveness.

Rep. Denver Riggleman said the Green New Deal “removes all semblance of common sense from legislating.” “It’s poorly conceived and not feasible.  It spends trillions of taxpayers dollars on ‘planting lots of trees’ and ‘eliminating air travel.'” #VA05  https://t.co/4pZHw7M0Ng

Our family business was packed today. Glad I was able to jump in and help out. Great to be back home! #SmallBusinessesWork #VA05 https://t.co/oDsmIpL0uZ
